title: its not only 1 champ, its the whole game that is broken.
body:
i cant even enjoy that game since season 6.
too many gimmicks
too many "wtf" moments
too much burst and too much tankiness/high damage at once
too many broken champion kits/items/builds
fed rengars everywhere
0/7/3 ->  14/8/9 vaynes everywhere
champion "reworks" aka. "lets buff champs into a broken state by giving them 12391293 new stuff in their kits"
silver game designer (sorry not sorry)
too much snowball.

the whole game feels very broken, its a huge mess. riot is like my uncle, he repairs something and tries his BEST but breaks two other things at the same time lul.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Welcome to preseason, is this your first time?

PS5, AP warwick was an immortal god and possibly the most broken thing ever seen in league.
PS6, graves just wandered around the map oneshotting people with autos and healing half his hp per shot, not to speak of yasuo.  Everyone that was not graves ran thunderlords regardless of role or lane. 

Big changes mean big problems, which is why riot suspends ranked while they collect data and adjust balance.
